name: Food And Drink 52 Quiz | Mixed Food and Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: What country is the home of the relish called chutney?
questions.explanation:
India.

	Chutney is a piquant relish made of fruit and spices.

questions.text: In culinary terms what is one half of the body of an animal called?
What color bottle is Cointreau poured from?
What beer brand uses the slogan 'It's the water'?
What country does Gazpacho hail from?
questions.explanation:
Spain.

	It is a cold soup made with tomatoes,green peppers,garlic,olive oil,water, vinegar and cucumbers.

questions.text: Which of these is NOT a Scottish whisky?
The pots that were used in distilling malt whiskey were made mainly of what?
questions.explanation:
Copper.

	Copper is a good conductor, resistant to corrosion and ductile.

questions.text: Which is not one of the five most frequently consumed fruits in the United States?
questions.explanation:
Pear.

	Watermelon and cantaloupe round out the top 5.

questions.text: What kind of jam is added to Boston Cream Pie to make it a Washington Pie?
What does the skin of the grape contain?
questions.explanation:
Natural yeast.

	Their skins are covered with a waxy coating to trap in the yeast.
